context: Hello, I am doing well! Thank you.
I'm wanting to find out all of the hype with these comic book movies. Where do i start?
I heard they are all tied together like Thor and Iron Man (2008) are on the same team or something
Yes, exactly and they all are a twist on real human adventures Most are bad science experiments gone wrong.
But Batman movies like The Dark Knight (2008) isn't a part of that?
I like both movies that you mentioned Thor
Then when you bring the The Avengers (2012) into it I get confused haha. Okay I'll watch Thor
Haha well luckily if you watch each movie they do really stand alone.
Good to know lol thank you for your help DC vs Marvel is such a weird world!
The Avengers (2012) are all apart of the same world with individual problems with their gifts That is a good point of view you make. I did not think to mention the different brands of comics
Do the Avengers hang out with Iron Man (2008) and those guys? I'm thinking Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) !!! LOL im sorry
Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) is more like Star Wars (1977)
okay I see. Thank you for explaining. Whenever I try to keep up my boyfriend gets so annoyed. I basically have to wiki everything
The stories of the Universe verses galaxy and worlds. I love them all. They are very entertaining
its good to know they are all separate. have a good one!
resp: Yes you do the same. Try one of the newer stories like Deadpool 2 (2018) you may not be able to tie it into other comic stories. However, you will surely be entertained. you too.

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?

I'm looking for a chilling, terrifying and suspenseful horror movie, an intriguing and suspenseful mystery, and a suspenseful and thrilling thriller with gripping suspense. Do you have any recommendations?
context.feelings: I'm easily bored with movie choices. I want something more engaging and exciting. I hope the recommender understands my preference. Let's see what they recommend.

context.content: Have you seen The Silence of the Lambs (1991)?
Can you tell me more about The Silence of the Lambs (1991)?
context.feelings: I'm feeling uninterested in this recommendation. I hope the next one will be more engaging and exciting. The recommender is trying, but I need something more thrilling and suspenseful.

context.content: It's about a group of people that are sent to a mental institution and are interrogated and interrogated. It's really chilling.
Hmm, that sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about the plot and the main characters?
context.feelings: I'm feeling uninterested in this recommendation. It doesn't sound like it covers all the genres I'm looking for. I need something more engaging and exciting. The recommender is trying, but I need a movie that really captures my interest.

context.content: The Silence is about a bunch of people who are sent on a mission to find a killer. They end up on a plane crash and are on their own. It is really chilling and suspense filled.
Hmm, that sounds interesting, but it doesn't seem to cover all the genres I'm looking for. Can you recommend something more thrilling and suspenseful?

context.content: It's about a man who is sent to a facility where he is interrogated and then is sent back to a different dimension to try and solve the mystery. It has a lot of twists and turns.
